translations: 慈善的；仁慈的，宽容的；慷慨的

sentences.sentence: He had set up two charitable trusts.
sentences.translation: 他已经成立了两家慈善信托机构。

sentences.sentence: We are happy to donate to bona fide charitable causes.
sentences.translation: 我们很乐意向真正的慈善事业捐赠。

sentences.sentence: Today there are many charitable organizations which specialize in helping the weary traveler.
sentences.translation: 今天有许多慈善组织专门帮助疲惫的旅行者。
